body:
I've been away for a while in France as a holiday and missed loads... 
It was actually really fun but kinda consisted of; swimming, football, swimming, eating, walking and visiting some places.

Then we decided to go to Walt Disney studio park and it was; roller coasters, eating, roller coasters 

So yeah, hope everyone has been good and...

Ask me anything!

title: [!AMA!]

replies.body: Thought I would bump this one instead of creating a whole new AMA, so, ask away!
replies.body_tagged: Thought I would bump this one instead of creating a whole new AMA, so, ask away!

replies.body:
Who are you? Opinions on me?
Favourite food? Favourite Football team?
Favourite Fruit? Favourite Animal?
If you can revive Berzerk, would you?
replies.body_tagged:
Who are you? Opinions on me?
Favourite food? Favourite Football team?
Favourite Fruit? Favourite Animal?
If you can revive Berzerk, would you?

replies.body:
1. I am me (: 
2. I've never really talked to you much apart from during my map building but you seem to be a kind person who is a pretty good player and a really active member on Avicus.
3. Chelseaaaaaa
4. Apples
5. Ermmmm... Either an eagle or a penguin.
6. If all of the old members agreed to come back then probably, yes.
